name: WeCastle
description: The fully on-chain roguelite RPG set Game on the Aptos blockchain . Building a Roguelite RPG Game on Telegram Mini App. Players dive into a challenging world of dungeons filled with fierce monsters and hidden treasures, with all gas fees sponsored for a seamless and immersive gameplay experience

name: KongBall
description:
In simple terms, in the KongBall game, you can experience the current complete game process by following these steps:

Login by Razor Wallet
Open the vault and bet the specific amount to create a room
You can earn from the bot randomnress or Invite your friend by user address
Play the game
Based on your strategy, make decision to win and receive the rewards
awards: Runner Ups - Battle of Olympus Hackathon

name: Social Move
description: A product that brings user experiences when using web3 dApp of Movement on X.
features: Interact with dApp on social network X

name: ActionX
description: Bringing a great experience when combining dApp and social by bringing the dApp to social network X, in addition to creating an AI chat bot to help web2 users easily access products on the ecosystem Aptos
features: Interact with dApp on social network X
Interact with dApps on AI chat bots

name: Wedata
description: Wedata is a decentralized storage and data marketplace platform for researchers and data enthusiasts. It uses web3storage to securely and efficiently store large datasets, fostering collaborative workspaces for knowledge-sharing and data access. Wedata also features an AI Launcher, where AI developers and researchers from the web3 community connect, share ideas, and innovate in a decentralized environment.

name: Wave Wallet
description: Water Wallet is a user-friendly browser extension built on Algorand, designed to simplify crypto asset management. By offering Google login for seamless account creation and access, it removes the need for traditional seed phrase storage, making crypto more accessible for beginners and experts alike.

name: AlgoIDE
description: AlgoIDE is a cloud-based IDE that simplifies smart contract development on Algorand. It supports multiple languages like PyTeal, JavaScript and Python, offers real-time collaboration among developers, and integrates AI assistance for coding. Accessible from any device, it allows direct deployment to Algorand's network, aiming to streamline smart contract creation and enhance collaborative development
awards: Top 1 Algorand Hackathon Vietnam - Track Infrastructure & Tooling

name: Sui Simulator
description: To strengthen the Sui developer community, Weminal team has developed Sui Simulator â€” an open-source VSCode Extension that simplifies Sui smart contract development by providing quick tools and ready-to-use testing and development environments, thus reducing overall development time. Serving as a central hub, it enables builders to write code, set up environments, manage coins, build, test, and publish Sui contracts, perform simulations (Programmable Transaction Blocks), explore packages, and visualize dynamic object graphs.
awards: Third Place Sui Overflow hackathon - Track Advanced Move Features
Community Favorite Award Sui Overflow hackathon
Ecosystem Bounty Prize - AngelHack - Sui Overflow hackathon

name: Mulink
description: A project built to optimize dapps on X social using X cards
features: Use the url to mint NFT on X social itself
awards: Champion at Polkadot Hackathon VietNam 2024 - Track Unique Network
